title: Dolphin Deceleration
body: A $$35.0-kg$$ dolphin decelerates from $$12.0$$ to $$7.50$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ in $$2.30$$ s to join another dolphin in play. What average force was exerted to slow him if he was moving horizontally? (The gravitational force is balanced by the buoyant force of the water.)
